summary: REQ-5 (special message toggle button on the Rose Day card) appears implemented in frontend/src/App.tsx with toggle state, visible button text, and stopPropagation to prevent triggering the page-level emoji burst. Styling for the revealed message is added in frontend/src/index.css. REQ-6 (deployment to a public URL / production build) is not evidenced by the provided diff summary.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the updated Rose Day site so it is accessible via a shareable public URL (production build succeeds; public URL available and loads updated page).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary only shows frontend code/CSS changes and project metadata; there are no changes or artifacts indicating deployment configuration, build pipeline updates, or a produced public URL.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state update unrelated to adding the special-message button or deployment (e.g., project_state.json changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements focus on adding a toggle button (REQ-5) and deploying (REQ-6); updating internal project tracking files is not requested as a product requirement.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated repository documentation/summary file describing frontend files (frontend-file-summaries.txt).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-5 or REQ-6; appears to be auxiliary documentation rather than implementing the specified button behavior or deployment.
